title: Prospect
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is a Prospect
custom_expected: THEN user cannot see any Club, Scout, or Central Office screens or data.

title: Scouting Bureau Scout - INCOMPLETE
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is a Scouting Bureau Scout
custom_expected:
THEN Scouting Bureau Scout can invite prospects
AND can view prospects invited by all teams
AND can view prospects invited by Scouting Bureau
AND cannot create questionnaires
AND cannot review questionnaires
AND can see the Scouting Bureau's screens and data
AND cannot see any other Central Office screens or data?

title: Team Scout
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is a Team Scout
custom_expected:
THEN Team Scout can invite prospects
AND can view prospects invited by their team only
AND cannot see Prospects invited by any other team
AND can view prospects invited by Scouting Bureau
AND cannot create questionnaires
AND cannot review questionnaires
AND can only see their Club's screens and data
AND cannot see any other Central Office screens or data.

Login with:
test2-indians@indians.com
Summer1!
OR
test2-yankees@yankees.com
Summer1!

title: Club Questionnaire Author
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is a Club Questionnaire Author
custom_expected:
THEN user is a Team Scout
AND user can create questionnaires
AND user can only create questionnaires for their club
AND user cannot review questionnaires.

Login with:
test-indians@indians.com
Autumn1!
OR
test-yankees@yankees.com
Autumn1!

title: Club Questionnaire Admin
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is a Club Questionnaire Admin
custom_expected:
THEN user is a Club Questionnaire Author
AND user can review questionnaires
AND user has first-level approval of questionnaires for their club.

title: BOC Central Office
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is BOC Central Office staff
custom_expected:
THEN user cannot invite prospects
AND can view all invited prospects by all teams and the Bureau
AND cannot create questionnaires
AND can see all questionnaires
AND can review questionnaires
AND can comment on questionnaires
AND has final approval over questionnaires.

Login with:
test-centraloffice@mlb.com
Summer1!

title: Players are archived
custom_preconds: GIVEN that Prospect was invited to DP
custom_steps: WHEN Prospect signs with a Club to become a player
custom_expected:
THEN DP system automatically archives the Prospect
AND Prospect is not viewable to Scouts and Central Office.

title: INCOMPLETE Prospects are archived
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that a Prospect was invited to DP
AND Prospect graduated college
AND [X amount of time] has elapsed after the Prospect's graduation
custom_expected:
THEN DP system automatically archives the Prospect
AND Prospect is no longer viewable to Scouts and Central Office.
